sentence: "From parroting Donald Trump's lies about the election to embracing his far-right agenda," Pennsylvania Democratic Party spokesman Brendan Welch said in a statement, "Lou Barletta is running a campaign defined by Trumpian litmus tests and dangerous conspiracy theories."
author: Igor Derysh
title: Is Pennsylvania losing it? Hate groups proliferate as state GOP descends into MAGA paranoia

author: Lauren Rude
title: GOP governor candidates to participate in PA Family Forum

sentence: It was a lighthearted reprieve from an hour of consensus, as Lou Barletta, Bill McSwain, Jake Corman and Dave White — those in the field who have registered by name in recent polling — mostly agreed on the need to unleash Pennsylvania’s energy sector, cut the corporate net income tax rate and make the state less of a regulatory maze for businesses.
author: Julian Routh
title: GOP governor candidates take magic wand approach to fix one thing in Pennsylvania

sentence: Mastriano, a State Senator representing Pennsylvania’s 33rd District, leads with 16.2% over Lou Barletta at 12.4%.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania Governor Primary Poll: Mastriano leads, majority undecided

sentence: Gubernatorial candidate Bill McSwain was a Trump-appointed U.S. Attorney and Lou Barletta was endorsed by Trump in the 2018 Senate race.
title: President Trump’s endorsement could sway voters in the Pennsylvania primary election, new poll finds

sentence: A WHTM/Emerson College Polling/The Hill Pennsylvania primary survey last week showed former Rep. Lou Barletta (19.8%) with a slight lead over state Sen. Doug Mastriano (19.4%) in the GOP gubernatorial primary race.
author: Charlie McCarthy
title: Trump Blasts Pennsylvania Governor Hopeful McSwain, Withholds Endorsement

sentence: Corman’s withdrawal still would have left eight Republican candidates vying for the party’s nomination, including McSwain, former U.S. Rep. Lou Barletta, state Sen. Doug Mastriano and former Delaware County Councilman Dave White.
author: The Philadelphia Inquirer
title: Jake Corman is staying in the Republican race for Pennsylvania governor after moving to drop out

sentence: Should Corman exit the race, eight Republicans remain in the crowded field: Doug Mastriano, Melissa Hart, Lou Barletta, Joe Gale, Nche Zama, William McSwain, Dave White, and Charlie Gerow.
author: Dennis Owens
title: Jake Corman petitions to remain in Governor’s race after reportedly speaking with Donald Trump

sentence: Former Rep. Lou Barletta (R-PA) is the current front-runner in the crowded field of Republicans running to become Pennsylvania's next governor.
author: Emily Singer
title: Trump Bashes GOP Candidate In Pennsylvania For Failing To Overturn 2020 Election

sentence: Should Corman exit the race, eight Republicans remain in the crowded field: Doug Mastriano, Melissa Hart, Lou Barletta, Joe Gale, Nche Zama, William McSwain, Dave White, and Charlie Gerow.
author: WKOK Staff
title: Jake Corman Pulls Out, Then Returns to PA Gubernatorial Race

sentence: Leading GOP candidates Doug Mastriano and Lou Barletta even took part in Trump’s fraudulent elector scheme.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Trump Says He Advised Barr to Get Impeached in Support of Bogus Election Claims

sentence: State Sen. Doug Mastriano of Franklin County, former U.S. Rep. Lou Barletta of Luzerne County, Delaware County businessman Dave White and former U.S. Attorney Bill McSwain of Chester County turned down the invitation for this week’s debate sponsored by Spotlight PA. An early March Fox News poll of Republican voters had Barletta favored at 19%, Mastriano at 18%, White at 14% and McSwain at 11%, with about 25% saying they were undecided for the primary.
author: Chris Ullery
title: 3 things to know about GOP gubernatorial race debate in Gettysburg
